00019 
00020 #ifndef __surfit_solver_jacobi__
00021 #define __surfit_solver_jacobi__
00022 
00023 #include <algorithm>
00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 #include <errno.h>
00027 
00028 #include "vec.h"
00029 #include "vec_alg.h"
00030 
00031 #include <float.h>
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 namespace surfit {
00036 
00037 template <class M, class V>
00038 vec * jacobi(M * A, V * b, int max_it, REAL tol, vec *& X, REAL omega = REAL(1.6), REAL undef_value = FLT_MAX) {
00039 
00040         int flag = 0;                                // initialization
00041         int iter = 0;
00042         
00043         REAL bnrm2 = norm2( b );
00044         if  ( bnrm2 == REAL(0) )
00045                 bnrm2 = REAL(1); 
00046 
00047         vec * r = new vec(b->size());
00048         
00049         vec * x = NULL;
00050         if (!X) {
00051                 x = new vec(b->size());
00052                 int cnt;
00053                 for (cnt = 0; cnt < b->size(); cnt++) {
00054                         (*x)(cnt) = (*b)(cnt);
00055                 };
00056         }
00057         else 
00058         {
00059                 x = X;
00060                 X = NULL;
00061         }
00062 
00063         REAL error = FLT_MAX;
00064         REAL error_norm = bnrm2;        
00065         REAL sigma = 0;
00066         int i,j,prev_j;
00067 
00068         int n = b->size();
00069         REAL a_ii;
00070 
00071         REAL MM = A->norm();
00072         REAL gamma = REAL(2)/(MM);
00073 
00074         vec * x_1 = new vec(*x);
00075 
00076         for (iter = 0; iter < max_it; iter++) {
00077 
00078                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00079                         
00080                         a_ii = A->at(i,i);
00081                         if (a_ii == REAL(0)) 
00082                                 continue;
00083 
00084                         sigma = 0;
00085                         
00086                         for (j = 0; j < i;) {
00087                                 prev_j = j;
00088                                 sigma += (*x)(prev_j)*A->at(i,j,&j);
00089                         }
00090 
00091                         for (j = i+1; j < n;) {
00092                                 prev_j = j;
00093                                 sigma += (*x)(prev_j)*A->at(i,j,&j);
00094                         }
00095                         
00096                         (*x_1)(i) = ( ((*b)(i) - sigma )/a_ii -(*x)(i))*gamma + (*x)(i);
00097                         
00098                 }
00099                 
00100                 error = 0;
00101                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00102                         error += ((*x)(i) - (*x_1)(i))*((*x)(i) - (*x_1)(i));
00103                 }
00104                 error /= error_norm;
00105                 if (error < tol)
00106                         break;
00107                 
00108                 *x = *x_1;
00109 
00110         }
00111 
00112         delete x_1;
00113 
00114         writelog(SURFIT_MESSAGE,"jacobi: (%d)\terror : %12.6G iter : %d",x->size(), error, iter);
00115 
00116         return x;
00117         
00118 };
00119 
00120 }; // namespace surfit;
00121 
00122 #endif
